mainSequence.step: Admin requests to view advertisements list
List advertises view shows the list of advertisements to Admin
Admin clicks on edit button of an advertisement
List advertises view redirects to edit advertise view
Edit advertise view displays the content of the advertisement to Admin
Admin edits the advertisement data and saves changes
Edit advertise view sends data to AdsController
AdsController saves the data in AdsModel
AdsModel confirms the saved data back to AdsController
AdsController returns data about the successful save to edit advertise view
Edited advertisement is displayed to Admin
